comment.author: 62233671@N03
comment._content: According to the Kansas Historical society, Cardish, "a Native American, was found guilty of arson on a government reservation in Wisconsin." www.kansasmemory.org/item/223379 She was charged with four counts of arson along with Louisa La Motte, another Native American for burning down part of the Menominee Indian Training school. Apparently they were charged with separate indictments for the "girls building" and the "boys building". A report was published in The Federal reporter: with key-number annotations ..., Volume 145. books.google.com/books?id=bzk4AAAAIAAJ&lpg=PA243&...
